version_description:
- New look of your favourite shows and movies depending on the progress. You can now easily browse seasons and download multiple episodes in one go.
- Various fixes and improvements.

- Easier downloads - they will not require you to finalise by reopening the app again at the end of download
- Continue watching your favourite shows now automatically resumed
- Various improvements and bug fixes

This version of Showmax app brings you refreshed downloads page, just in time for holiday trips. We hope you will enjoy your favourite movies and series downloaded in the new layout while travelling. The update also brings bug fixes and improved stability. Please keep your app up to date and let us know your feedback via showmax.com/contact.

Version 41.0 brings significant improvements in performance of the home page. You might not notice it directly, however, trust us, it is actually much faster.
Version 41.0 brings significant improvements in performance of the home page. You might not notice it directly, however, trust us, it is actually much faster.
Version 41.0 brings significant improvements in performance of the home page. You might not notice it directly, however, trust us, it is actually much faster.

Version 42 brings one new convenience to your downloads list: when you have downloaded multiple episodes of a season, tapping to see more episodes will open the list positioned at the last episode you downloaded. This way, you do not have to scroll or look for next episode(s) to download, it will be conveniently in your view.

Every major version needs some interations with fixes and tweaks. We made plenty of them in this version.

55.0
Not all changes we made are visible but we still keep to make them so your life is easier and experience with the app even more fun. Tell us if you like this latest version at showmax.com/contact. Also don’t forget that 5 stars makes us happy and motivated to continue working hard.

Version 47 brings you the new look and feel of the player screen. Being the central element of our app, we did a number of changes and tweaks to improve usability and overall experience. Additionally, we wanted to improve your watching experience by adding a possibility to skip opening credits on movies and series, so you can enjoy your favourites without interruptions. We hope you will like it!

Thanks for using Showmax! We regularly update our app to add new features, fix bugs and improve performance. Enjoy this fresh new update which includes:

Redesigned Navigation 
Redesigned creation/edit and management of Profiles 
Easy to swap Profile selection 
Updated Kids section - packed with content and easy interactions 
New Parental Controls 
Section content now browsable with left swipe scrolling

We are bringing improvements on our newest features. Are you bored of passwords and PIN codes? Biometrics authentication feature allows you to manage profiles and play PIN protected assets in a seconds with your Touch/Face ID. Do you want to recommend the best and newest movies and series to your family and friends? Try our new Share feature and let your people know via social media or  in direct message.

v75.0
We regularly update Showmax to bring you new and improved features, bug fixes and stability. Please keep your app up to date to get the best experience and let us know your feedback at showmax.com/contact.
## Improved
- Smoother animations and transitions all around the app
## Fixes 
- Fixed an issue that displayed wrong image for some episode previews
- Fixed an issue that showed incorrect expiration for downloaded content
- Fixed an issue that displayed some downloaded content twice
- Fixed an issue that prevented from opening application settings when the wi-fi was switched off

We regularly update Showmax to bring you new and improved features, bug fixes and greater stability. Get the latest update to ensure the best possible experience. If you’ve got feedback, we’d love to hear it at showmax.com/contact.

## Added
- More control over your data - we added a new in-player option to change video quality during playback
## Changed
- We've switched the lights off and the app is now in dark mode. It's easier on your eyes, and saves battery life on devices with OLED displays
## Fixed
- Fixed an issue that was causing the Zoom button to overlap with the Share button in the player
